name: MINERBOLD
description:
Keys (click to get focus):

Left, Right, Up, Down, ESC for menu, SPACE -- for any key
Hint: you can push stones upwards and sometimes... in the fly.

You can select any level.

Note

You can download this (and other) game(s) for PC/Linux/MacOS X/Android/S60 and others OSes here: http://instead.syscall.ru Just install INSTEAD interpreter. The game itself is here: http://instead-games.ru/game.php?ID=197
